A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie wasn't just disrespectful to the franchise and its long time fans.  It was just flat out a bad movie.  JJ Abrams almost destroyed the franchise with the nonsensical The Force Awakens\, but this one was even worse.  I try to stay away from theaters\, but make exceptions for Star Wars and Star Trek.  I won't being going to the theaters anymore for Star Wars.  Disney has lot my trust and Rian Johnson seems like an egomaniac and bad director.
